definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The United Nations Security Council approved a joint cease-fire resolution.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國安理會通過了一個聯合停火決議。

sentences.english: According to reports, Cambodian foreign ministers will attend the 14th meeting of the Council.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，泰柬兩國外長將出席14日的安理會會議。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama is the first U.S. president to chair a summit-level meeting at the council.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬是主持安理會峯會級會議的首位美國總統。

sentences.english: China supports the holding of this high-level Security Council meeting on counter piracy off the coast of Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 中國支持安理會就索馬里海盜問題召開高級別會議。

sentences.english: Bush and Blair later failed to obtain security council authorisation.
sentences.chinese: 布什和布萊爾後來未能獲得安理會授權。

sentences.english: Lacroix said other nations on the Security Council expressed a similar position.
sentences.chinese: 拉克魯瓦說，安理會其他成員國也表達了類似的立場。

sentences.english: Is a divided Security Council really any use?
sentences.chinese: 被分裂的安理會還有何用？

sentences.english: The Arab League hopes that the U.N. Security Council will play an even greater role on the Middle East issue.
sentences.chinese: 阿盟希望聯合國安理會在中東問題上發揮更大作用。

sentences.english: The Council of Vienne was the 15th ecumenical council of the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 安理會的維埃納省，是十五合一會，羅馬天主教教堂。

sentences.english: Delisting requires the assent of the five permanent members of the UN security council.
sentences.chinese: 撤銷名字需要聯合國安理會五個常任理事國的同意。

sentences.english: Rosoff told the meeting that the Council's legitimacy depends on its reform.
sentences.chinese: 羅塞夫在會上指出，安理會的合法性有賴於它的改革。

sentences.english: This will be Turkey's fourth time sitting on the council.
sentences.chinese: 這將是土耳其第四次擔任安理會非常任理事國。

sentences.english: S. policy on the post-Cold War Security Council expansion issue.
sentences.chinese: 美國對冷戰後安理會擴大問題的政策。

sentences.english: We always advocate for maintaining unity of the Security Council and do not support taking hasty actions.
sentences.chinese: 我們一貫主張維護安理會團結，不贊成匆忙採取行動。

sentences.english: China believes achievements have been made in implementing the UN Security Council Resolution 1441.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，執行安理會1441號決議是有成果的。

sentences.english: Mister Ban was the winner this week in unofficial voting by the Security Councial.
sentences.chinese: 潘先生是此次安理會非正式投票的贏家。

definition: signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
